author: chinthaka
msg: Adding one more goal to create all the distributable jars in one shot.

People seems having problems with the name of the core jar as the core module also creates a core jar. So changed the name of the jar to kernel. This jar will contain the stuff from core, xml, wsdl and common modules.

author: deepal
msg: changes Axis2 to support deployment mechanism as described in
So according to that axis2.xml always need not be in repository , it can be in somewhere . I think I dont need to explain everything here the mail explains everything.
- default_axis2.xml is in core/org.apache.axis2.deployment (which dose not have addressing module engaged)
- and axis2.xml is in core/conf (which has addressing module engaged)
